tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE reports (
	report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	athlete_id INT,
	report_date DATE,
	report_type VARCHAR(50),
	report_content TEXT
);
CREATE TABLE athletes (athlete_id INT PRIMARY KEY, athlete_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, sport VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, age INT, gender CHAR(1) NOT NULL, date_of_birth DATE);
CREATE TABLE attendance (attendance_id INT PRIMARY KEY, athlete_id INT, date DATE, attended BOOLEAN NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE performance (performance_id INT PRIMARY KEY, athlete_id INT, date DATE, performance_rating DOUBLE NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE trends (trend_id INT PRIMARY KEY, athlete_id INT, trend_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, trend_value VARCHAR(255));

CREATE TABLE Performance (
  performance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  athlete_id INT REFERENCES Athletes(athlete_id),
  performance_date DATE,
  performance_metric VARCHAR(50),
  performance_value FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE Reports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  athlete_id INT REFERENCES Athletes(athlete_id),
  report_date DATE,
  report_type VARCHAR(50),
  report_content TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Trends (
  trend_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  athlete_id INT REFERENCES Athletes(athlete_id),
  trend_date DATE,
  trend_type VARCHAR(50),
  trend_description TEXT
);
